stories.text:
I keep a public "digital garden"[0] with an amalgamation of assorted/random notes/lists/cheatsheets on stuff it interest me on present moment or on the long term. Many of you have one also and I suspect fellow HNers would like to see "what (and how) do you plant there".

[0] https://github.com/slowernews/notebook
stories.title: Ask HN: Show us your digital garden
Beethoven's Unfinished 10th Symphony Brought to Life by Artificial Intelligence

stories.text: Some people who have not English as mother tongue suffers from reading comprehension. It may be lack of practice, but in day to day life they encounter their mother language more often. This makes them to practice English hard.
stories.title: Are people who don't have English as mother tongue suffers from dislexia?
